dcterms:creator: P. Weinzaepfel
X. Martin
C. Schmid
dcterms:description: The DALY dataset consists of human-object interaction actions and is annotated based on sparse spatial supervision. It includes 10 action classes such as Drinking, Phoning, and Brushing Teeth, with a total of 510 videos.
dcterms:title: DALY

dcterms:creator: P. Weinzaepfel
X. Martin
C. Schmid
dcterms:description: The Daily Action Localization in YouTube (DALY) dataset consists of 10 action classes of human-object interactions and is annotated based on sparse spatial supervision.
dcterms:title: Daily Action Localization in YouTube (DALY)
